caller_intent: Holly Shields is seeking assistance with unresolved billing issues on her auto insurance policy and a separate policy for Whitman, including discrepancies in coverage and required documentation (permit and proof of insurance).
resolution_steps: Brandi confirms the caller's identity and policy type (auto insurance).
Identifies the core issues: Whitman's policy has a significant outstanding balance, and Rosco (likely a driver) lacks a valid license (only has a permit).
Notes that Holly has already submitted required documentation but needs to resend Whitman's insurance proof.
Plans to contact National General (the carrier) to resolve policy discrepancies and billing errors.
Requests Holly to send a photo of Whitman's permit to expedite resolution.
Commitment to follow up with Holly after resolving the issues with National General.
knowledge_required: Understanding of auto insurance policy structures and billing processes
Knowledge of documentation requirements for drivers (permits, insurance proof)
Ability to interface with carrier systems (National General) to resolve policy issues
systems_referenced: Internal policy management system (to check policy details)
summary: Holly Shields contacted Brandi to resolve billing discrepancies on her auto insurance policy and a separate policy for Whitman. Brandi identified issues with Whitman's policy balance and Rosco's lack of a valid license, planned to contact National General for resolution, and requested additional documentation from Holly. A follow-up call is pending after carrier intervention.
